title: Diagnose Hydraulic System Failure
description: The hydraulic system on a large excavator is operating sluggishly. A maintenance technician must diagnose the problem.

tasks.description: Connect a diagnostic tool to the excavator's control system to read fault codes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent connects the tool and retrieves a 'Low Hydraulic Pressure' fault code.

tasks.description: Consult the equipment's troubleshooting manual for the 'Low Hydraulic Pressure' code.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the manual suggests checking the hydraulic filter for clogs as a primary cause.

tasks.description: Inspect the hydraulic filter and find that it is clogged. Create a work order to replace the filter and the hydraulic fluid.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the root cause and creates a work order to fix it.
